title: A fond farewell...
body:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/33/Mordekaiser_OriginalSkin_old3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190527183109&format=original

And so, we pay homage to the old Mordekaiser as he passes...

Thank you for bringing such great suffering.

Thank you for reminding us that this whole "living" thing was highly overrated.

Thank for for reminding us fools that we needed to only click once.

Thank you for showing us that with no pain comes no drain.

You were delightfully painful to us all.

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/544/022/2f0.gif
